mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE NOT bsort = 0 ORDER BY bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bcnt = bcnt +1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT* FROM board AS b, member AS m WHERE b.bno = #{bno} AND m.mno = b.mno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(mno, bdate, btitle, bcon, bfile1, bfile2, bcnt, bsort, betc, mid) VALUES(#{mno}, now(), #{btitle}, #{bcon}, #{bfile1}, #{bfile2}, 0, 1, #{betc} , #{mid})
INSERT INTO reply(rewriter, rememo, redate, bno) VALUES(#{rewriter}, #{rememo} ,now(), #{bno})
